channel.title: CVE Feed for intranda -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for intranda -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-29014|2024-08-02T14:00:14.389Z -- intranda -- goobi-viewer-core
item.description: The Goobi viewer is a web application that allows digitised material to be displayed in a web browser. A reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability has been identified in Goobi viewer core prior to version 23.03 when evaluating the LOGID parameter. An attacker could trick a user into following a specially crafted link to a Goobi viewer installation, resulting in the execution of malicious script code in the user's browser. The vulnerability has been fixed in version 23.03.

item.title: CVE-2023-29016|2024-08-02T14:00:14.349Z -- intranda -- goobi-viewer-core
item.description: The Goobi viewer is a web application that allows digitised material to be displayed in a web browser. A cross-site scripting vulnerability has been identified in Goobi viewer core prior to version 23.03 when using nicknames. An attacker could create a user account and enter malicious scripts into their profile's nickname, resulting in the execution in the user's browser when displaying the nickname on certain pages. The vulnerability has been fixed in version 23.03.

item.title: CVE-2023-29015|2024-08-02T14:00:14.382Z -- intranda -- goobi-viewer-core
item.description: The Goobi viewer is a web application that allows digitised material to be displayed in a web browser. A cross-site scripting vulnerability has been identified in the user comment feature of Goobi viewer core prior to version 23.03. An attacker could create a specially crafted comment, resulting in the execution of malicious script code in the user's browser when displaying the comment. The vulnerability has been fixed in version 23.03.
